item.title: Amazing theme
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Amazing theme, unique styling, seo rich, beautiful design, and world-class support. What else matters?

item.title: Amazing and serve all my needs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Thank you guys for these theme, it's really amazing and serve all my needs for personal blog! Especially, I want to mention kind and fast support, that help me a lot with tuning! Thank you, thank you, thank you!

item.title: Very professional
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The layout is beautiful, the manual is extensive but what I'm most impressed with is the after sales customer support. It is very professional, fast, efficient. The best I've experienced so far.

item.title: Great customer service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I was impressed with the help I've received from these guys. It's immediate. Great theme. Great customer service!

item.title: Support is commendable
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Support is commendable and documentation is rather comprehensive. Admin panel is also very easy to use. Highly recommended.

item.title: Excellent support
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Had a couple of problems due to my shared server limitations but excellent support enabled a workaround. The theme is also easy to work with. Recommended.

item.title: Support Quality
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Support Quality, Code Quality, Design Quality, everything is top!!!! I'm very very happy of this choice! After lot of themes i have found the theme right for my business!

item.title: Great customer service
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This site is well made with tons of features and great customer service that answers your questions in minutes (from my experience).
